messages.message:
David
So Jessica is horribly sick all of a sudden. She's been throwing up and having serious abdominal pain. She was treated and given some medication, so we'll see. Just wanted to let everybody know.

Other than some tiredness and congestion, I haven't had any problems since our return. If anyone else has had symptoms, let everybody know.

RJ
I hope she feels better.  Make sure she stays hydrated.

Michael
Damn,  i hope she gets better.

Heather
 I hope she starts feeling better!
